title: Set up a basic LangChain agent with no tools
goal: Establish a working LangChain agent execution loop.
action_items: [ ] Add `langchain` and necessary sub-packages (e.g., `langchain-openai`) to dependencies.
[ ] Choose a basic agent type (e.g., `create_openai_functions_agent` or a simple Runnable).
[ ] Create the agent executor or runnable chain.
[ ] Write a script to invoke the agent with a sample input.
test_criteria: Invoke the agent with any user prompt (e.g., 'Hello').
Verify the agent returns a static, predefined response (e.g., 'Hello, I am Cogni').
